events.title: Lunar Adventure
events.description: Experience the tranquility of the Moon and marvel at Earth's beauty from space.

events.title: Mission to Mars
events.description: Join a once-in-a-lifetime expedition to the Red Planet, with guided tours of Olympus Mons and Valles Marineris.

events.title: Discover Atlantis
events.description: Dive into the mysteries of the lost city of Atlantis, located deep beneath the Atlantic Ocean.

events.title: Journey to Jupiter
events.description: Explore the breathtaking storms of Jupiter and visit its largest moon, Ganymede.

events.title: Meteorite Hunt
events.description: Embark on an interstellar adventure to hunt for rare meteorites on asteroids and distant moons.

events.title: Surprise Surprise
events.description: A mystery destination in the cosmos. Prepare for a unique and unforgettable experience.
